abilities.name: Activate Place of Power
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Hero within 3" of any Places of Power to use this ability.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on that Hero. On a 2+:
• If that Hero is a Wizard or Priest, add 1 to casting rolls or chanting rolls for that Hero this turn.
• If that Hero is not a Wizard or Priest, they can use the ‘Unbind’ or ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability this turn as if they had Wizard (1).

abilities.name: All-out Attack
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared an Attack ability
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made as part of that Attack ability. This also affects weapons that have the Companion weapon ability.

abilities.name: All-out Defence
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared an Attack ability
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for that unit in this phase.

abilities.name: At the Double
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Run ability
abilities.effect: Do not make a run roll as part of that Run ability. Instead, add 6" to that unit’s Move characteristic to determine the distance each model in that unit can move as part of that Run ability.

abilities.name: Banish Manifestation
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Wizard or Priest to use this ability, pick a manifestation within 30" of them to be the target, then make a banishment roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the banishment roll equals or exceeds the banishment value listed on the manifestation’s warscroll, it is banished and removed from play. You cannot pick the same manifestation as the target of this ability more than once per turn.

abilities.name: Bodyguard
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in your general’s regiment that is not your general to be the honour guard. You can pick a unit in reserve. If you use this ability, you cannot use any other Honour Guard abilities.
abilities.effect:
Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of enemy units’ melee weapons while they are in combat with your general if both of the following are true:

• The honour guard is wholly within 6" of your general. 
• The honour guard did not charge this turn.

abilities.name: Champion
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by champions in this unit.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat and has not used a Run or Retreat ability this turn to use this ability. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: That unit can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. That unit can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units and must end that move within ½" of a visible enemy unit. If it does so, the unit using this ability has charged.

abilities.name: Counter-charge
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: That unit can use a Charge ability as if it were your charge phase.

abilities.name: Covering Fire
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Resolve shooting attacks for that unit, but all of the attacks must target the nearest visible enemy unit and you must subtract 1 from the hit rolls for those attacks.

abilities.name: Deploy Faction Terrain
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly faction terrain feature that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target faction terrain feature wholly within friendly territory, more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. After you have done so, it has been deployed.

abilities.name: Deploy Regiment
abilities.declare: Pick a regiment from your army roster to be the target. No units in that regiment can have already been deployed.
abilities.effect: Keep using Deploy abilities without alternating until all units in that regiment have been deployed. You cannot pick units that are not in that regiment as the target of any of those Deploy abilities.

abilities.name: Deploy Unit
abilities.declare: Pick a unit from your army roster that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target unit wholly within friendly territory and more than 9" from enemy territory. After you have done so, it has been deployed.

abilities.name: Fight
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is in combat or that charged this turn to use this ability. That unit can make a pile-in move. Then, if that unit is in combat, you must pick one or more enemy units as the target(s) of that unit’s attacks.
abilities.effect: Resolve combat attacks against the target unit(s).

abilities.name: Fly
abilities.effect: As this unit moves, it ignores other models, terrain features and the combat ranges of enemy units. It cannot end its move in combat unless specified in the ability that allowed it to move. Ignore any vertical distance moved for this unit.

abilities.name: Forward to Victory
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Charge ability
abilities.effect: You can re-roll the charge roll.

abilities.name: Guarded Hero
abilities.effect:
If this Hero is within the combat range of a friendly unit that is not a Hero:
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this Hero.
• If this Hero is Infantry, they cannot be picked as the target of shooting attacks made by units more than 12" from them.

abilities.name: Magical Intervention
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Wizard or Priest to use this ability.
abilities.effect: That friendly unit can use a Spell or Prayer ability (as appropriate) as if it were your hero phase. If you do so, subtract 1 from casting rolls or chanting rolls made as part of that ability.

abilities.name: Musician
abilities.effect: While this unit contains any musicians, if it uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make one additional rally roll of D6.

abilities.name: Normal Move
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Power Through
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then you must pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target. The target must have a lower Health characteristic than the unit using this ability.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, the unit using this ability can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through and end that move within the combat ranges of enemy units that were in combat with it at the start of the move, but not those of other enemy units. It does not have to end the move in combat.

abilities.name: Priority Target
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in your general’s regiment that is not your general to be the honour guard. You can pick a unit in reserve. If you use this ability, you cannot use any other Honour Guard abilities.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made by the honour guard that target any units in the enemy general’s regiment.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect:
Make 6 rally rolls of D6. For each 4+, you receive 1 rally point. Rally points can be spent in the following ways:

• For each rally point spent, Heal (1) that unit.
• You can spend a number of rally points equal to the Health characteristic of that unit to return a slain model to that unit. 

You can spend the rally points in any combination of the above. Unspent rally points are then lost.

abilities.name: Redeploy
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Each model in that unit can move up to D6". That move cannot pass through or end within the combat range of an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Retreat
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit. That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. That unit can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units but cannot end that move within an enemy unit’s combat range.

abilities.name: Run
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Make a run roll of D6. That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic added to the run roll. That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Shoot
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not used a Run or Retreat ability this turn to use this ability. Then, pick one or more enemy units as the target(s) of that unit’s attacks (see 16.0).
abilities.effect: Resolve shooting attacks against the target unit(s).

abilities.name: Special Assignment
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in your general’s regiment that is not your general to be the honour guard. You can pick a unit in reserve. If you use this ability, you cannot use any other Honour Guard abilities.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following weapon abilities:

• Anti-Infantry (+1 Rend)
• Anti-Cavalry (+1 Rend)
• Anti-Monster (+1 Rend)
• Anti-War Machine (+1 Rend) 
• Anti-Beast (+1 Rend)

In any turn in which the honour guard charged, that unit’s melee weapons have the weapon ability you picked. This has no effect on Companion weapons.

abilities.name: Standard Bearer
abilities.effect: While this unit contains any standard bearers, add 1 to this unit’s control score.

abilities.name: Tactical Gambit
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle Round, Start of Your Turn
abilities.effect: Pick 1 battle tactic that you have not yet attempted. You can attempt to complete that battle tactic this turn.

abilities.name: Unbind
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
abilities.effect: Make an unbinding roll of 2D6. If the roll exceeds the casting roll for the spell, then the spell is unbound and its effect is not resolved. This reaction cannot be used more than once per casting roll.

abilities.name: Ward Save
abilities.effect: In step 1 of the damage sequence (see 18.0), make a ward roll of D6 for each damage point in this unit’s damage pool. If the roll equals or exceeds this unit’s ward value, remove that damage point from the damage pool.

Aetherwrought Machineries.name: Summon Aethervoid Pendulum
Aetherwrought Machineries.declare: If there is not a friendly Aethervoid Pendulum on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Aetherwrought Machineries.effect: Set up an Aethervoid Pendulum wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Aetherwrought Machineries.name: Summon Quicksilver Swords
Aetherwrought Machineries.declare: If there is not a friendly Quicksilver Swords endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Aetherwrought Machineries.effect: Set up a Quicksilver Swords endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Aetherwrought Machineries.name: Summon Chronomantic Cogs
Aetherwrought Machineries.declare: If there is not a friendly Chronomantic Cogs endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Aetherwrought Machineries.effect: Set up a Chronomantic Cogs endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

Forbidden Power.name: Summon Horrorghast
Forbidden Power.declare: If there is not a friendly Horrorghast on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Forbidden Power.effect: Set up a Horrorghast wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Forbidden Power.name: Summon Soulscream Bridge
Forbidden Power.declare: If there is not a friendly Soulscream Bridge on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Forbidden Power.effect: Set up a Soulscream Bridge wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A Soulscream Bridge has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

Forbidden Power.name: Summon Shards of Valagharr
Forbidden Power.declare: If there is not a friendly Shards of Valagharr endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Forbidden Power.effect: Set up a Shards of Valagharr endless spell wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A Shards of Valagharr endless spell has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

Forbidden Power.name: Summon Lauchon the Soulseeker
Forbidden Power.declare: If there is not a friendly Lauchon the Soulseeker on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Forbidden Power.effect: Set up a Lauchon the Soulseeker wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Krondspine Incarnate.name: Summon Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur
Krondspine Incarnate.declare: If there is not a friendly Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Krondspine Incarnate.effect: Set up a Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Morbid Conjuration.name: Summon Purple Sun of Shyish
Morbid Conjuration.declare: If there is not a friendly Purple Sun of Shyish on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Morbid Conjuration.effect: Set up a Purple Sun of Shyish wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Morbid Conjuration.name: Summon Suffocating Gravetide
Morbid Conjuration.declare: If there is not a friendly Suffocating Gravetide on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Morbid Conjuration.effect: Set up a Suffocating Gravetide wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Morbid Conjuration.name: Summon Malevolent Maelstrom
Morbid Conjuration.declare: If there is not a friendly Malevolent Maelstrom on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Morbid Conjuration.effect: Set up a Malevolent Maelstrom wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Morbid Conjuration.name: Summon Soulsnare Shackles
Morbid Conjuration.declare: If there is not a friendly Soulsnare Shackles endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Morbid Conjuration.effect: Set up a Soulsnare Shackles endless spell wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A Soulsnare Shackles endless spell has 3 parts that must each be set up within 3" of at least 1 other part.

Primal Energy.name: Summon Burning Head
Primal Energy.declare: If there is not a friendly The Burning Head on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Primal Energy.effect: Set up The Burning Head wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Primal Energy.name: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm
Primal Energy.declare: If there is not a friendly Emerald Lifeswarm on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Primal Energy.effect: Set up an Emerald Lifeswarm wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Primal Energy.name: Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws
Primal Energy.declare: If there is not a friendly Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Primal Energy.effect: Set up a Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Twilit Sorceries.name: Summon Umbral Spellportal
Twilit Sorceries.declare: If there is not a friendly Umbral Spellportal on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Twilit Sorceries.effect: Set up an Umbral Spellportal wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. An Umbral Spellportal has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

Twilit Sorceries.name: Summon Geminids of Uhl-Gysh
Twilit Sorceries.declare: If there is not a friendly Geminids of Uhl-Gysh endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Twilit Sorceries.effect: Set up a Geminids of Uhl-Gysh endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Twilit Sorceries.name: Summon Prismatic Palisade
Twilit Sorceries.declare: If there is not a friendly Prismatic Palisade on the battlefield, pick a friendly Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Twilit Sorceries.effect: Set up a Prismatic Palisade wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Traverse the Tides of Death
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Infantry Wizard Hero within 3" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move. Then, remove the target from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield within 3" of this Manifestation and not in combat. Then, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Dancing Blades
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this Manifestation’s attacks.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Soul-Drain
abilities.effect:
Each time an enemy unit uses a Move ability while it is within 6" of any parts of this Manifestation, the effects of the ‘Fly’ ability do not apply to that unit.

Enemy units cannot be set up within 6" of either part of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Phantasmal Translocation
abilities.effect: Pick a part of this Manifestation, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 9" of the other part.

abilities.name: The Pendulum Swings
abilities.effect: This Manifestation cannot use Charge or Fight abilities. In addition, when this Manifestation moves, it must move in a straight line either in the direction in which the tip of the pendulum blade is pointing or in the opposite direction to the direction in which the tip of the pendulum blade is pointing.

abilities.name: Scything Blade
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units that this Manifestation passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D6 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Deathly Passage
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 6" of one part of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the other part of this Manifestation and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.effect: This Manifestation cannot be targeted by shooting attacks. In addition, a unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks if it is impossible to draw a straight line from a model in the attacking unit to a model in the target unit without that line passing across this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Mechanisms of Time
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
If there are any friendly Wizards within 3" of this Manifestation, pick 1 of the following effects:

Increase Time Flow: Until the start of your next turn, you can re roll charge rolls for friendly units while they are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation.

Decrease Time Flow: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this Manifestation moves, both its parts must end within 9" of each other.

Each part of this Manifestation is armed with Tendrils of Light and Shadow.

abilities.name: Tendrils of Shadow and Light
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use commands while they are within 3" of either part of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Harbinger of Horror
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by this Manifestation’s shooting attacks this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is less than the number of models in the target unit that were slain this phase, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ravening Hunger
abilities.declare: If this Manifestation charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 10 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Wild Form
abilities.effect: Each time this Manifestation is targeted by the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, if it would be banished, it is not banished. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Arcane Predator
abilities.effect: You can add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this Manifestation, to a maximum of 3, while it is within 18" of any enemy Manifestations, but if you do so, it must end the charge move within 1/2" of an enemy Manifestation.

abilities.name: Devourer of Magics
abilities.effect: If this Manifestation destroyed any enemy Manifestations this turn, Heal (6) this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Wild Form
abilities.effect: Each time this Manifestation is targeted by the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, if it would be banished, it is not banished Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Bounteous Healing
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit within 3" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: Heal (3) the target.

abilities.name: Restored Vigour
abilities.effect: Heal (3) this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Necrotic Vortex
abilities.effect:
Give this Manifestation 1 maelstrom point:

• Each time this Manifestation is set up.
• Each time a unit successfully casts a spell while it is within 12" of this Manifestation.
• Each time a model is slain within 12" of this Manifestation.

This Manifestation can have a maximum of 6 maelstrom points at once.

abilities.name: Morbid Detonation
abilities.declare: If this Manifestation has 6 maelstrom points, pick each unit (friendly and enemy) within 9" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this Manifestation is destroyed.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and all its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Bound for the Great Oubliette
abilities.declare: For each part of this Manifestation, you can pick an enemy unit within 3" of that part to be the targets. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Subtract a number of inches equal to the roll from the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Pulled to the Grave
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move. Then, you can pick an enemy unit that this Manifestation passed across during that move to be the target. Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Arcane Passage
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Wizard within 3" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: The next time the target uses a non-Summon Spell ability this phase, add 1 to the casting value of that spell. When picking targets for that spell, you can measure range and visibility from either part of this Manifestation instead of from the caster, and your opponent can measure range and visibility to either part of this Manifestation instead of to the caster for the purposes of the ‘Unbind’ ability.

abilities.name: Burning Up
abilities.effect: Each time this Manifestation uses a Shoot ability, after that ability has been resolved, allocate 1 damage point to this Manifestation (ward rolls cannot be made for that damage point).

abilities.name: End Given Form
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units that this Manifestation passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Pull of the Nadir
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for enemy units while they are within 3" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Wild Form
abilities.effect: Each time this Manifestation is targeted by the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, if it would be banished, it is not banished. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

battle_tactics.name: Do Not Waver
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if 2 or more friendly units fought this turn and no friendly units were destroyed this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Take Their Land
battle_tactics.description: Pick a terrain feature wholly or partially within enemy territory and wholly outside friendly territory. You complete this battle tactic if you control that terrain feature at the end of your turn.

battle_tactics.name: Slay the Entourage
battle_tactics.description: Pick a unit in the enemy general's regiment. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Seize the Centre
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if 2 or more friendly units are within 3" of the centre of the battlefield and are not in combat.

battle_tactics.name: Attack on Two Fronts
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if you control 2 or more objectives that you did not control at the start of your turn and at least 1 of those objectives was controlled by your opponent at the start of your turn.

battle_tactics.name: Take the Flanks
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if you have at least 1 friendly unit within 6" of each short battlefield edge, none of those units are wholly within friendly territory, and none of those units were setup this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Reclaim the Realms
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if there are 1 or more friendly units wholly within each quarter of the battlefield and more than 6" from all enemy units.

battle_tactics.name: Slay the Tyrants
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if an enemy Hero was slain this turn by a combat attack made by a friendly unit.

battle_tactics.name: Offering of Carnage
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if 2 or more enemy units were destroyed this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Ordained Charge
battle_tactics.description: Pick an objective controlled by your opponent. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if 2 or more friendly units charged this turn, 1 or more of those units are contesting that objective, and you control that objective.

battle_tactics.name: Marked for the Grave
battle_tactics.description: Pick a non-Hero enemy unit that has not had any models slain this battle. If there are no non-Hero enemy units on the battlefield, you can pick any unit type. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if that unit is destroyed this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Inevitable Demise
battle_tactics.description: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if 2 or more friendly units are wholly within enemy territory and more than 9" from all enemy units, and none of those units were set up this turn.

battle_tactics.name: Time to get Stuck in!
battle_tactics.description: Pick 3 friendly units that are not in combat and are wholly within friendly territory. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if each of those units is wholly outside your territory and used a Fight ability this turn.

battle_tactics.name: The Kunnin' Approach
battle_tactics.description: Pick an enemy unit that is in combat and a friendly unit that is not in combat. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if that friendly unit was in combat with that enemy unit this turn and that enemy unit was destroyed this turn.
